description: Detects use of Cobalt Strike commands accidentally entered in the CMD shell
author: _pete_0
TheDFIRReport
name: Operator Bloopers Cobalt Strike Commands
query: (((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Cmd.Exe") OR (process.executable.text:"*\\cmd.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:("cmd\ *" OR "cmd.exe*" OR "c\:\\windows\\system32\\cmd.exe*") AND process.command_line.text:("*psinject*" OR "*spawnas*" OR "*make_token*" OR "*remote\-exec*" OR "*rev2self*" OR "*dcsync*" OR "*logonpasswords*" OR "*execute\-assembly*" OR "*getsystem*")))
